scripts.create-build-dirs: mkdir -p static/build/js static/build/fonts static/build/css static/build/img private
scripts.build: npm run create-build-dirs && npm run build-fonts && npm run build-images && npm run build-js && npm run build-less
scripts.build-less: lessc --silent static/src/less/style.less static/build/css/style.css && cleancss -d --s0 -o static/build/css/style.css static/build/css/style.css
scripts.build-fonts: cp -R node_modules/bootstrap/dist/fonts static/build/ && cp -R node_modules/ionicons-pre/fonts static/build/
scripts.watch: npm run watch-less & npm run watch-images
scripts.clean: rm -rf static/build collected-static/ node_modules/ env/ private
